name: Express Avenue Mall
about: One of Chennai’s largest malls featuring fashion brands.
activities: Shopping, Dining, Cinema, Entertainment, Family hangout

name: VR Chennai Mall
about: Premium lifestyle destination with 240+ stores.

name: Phoenix Marketcity
about: High-end mall with 600+ international & Indian brands.

name: Aerohub Mall
about: Airport-connected mall with retail shops, food outlets.

name: Nexus Vijaya Mall
about: Spacious mall with 100+ stores, PVR Palazzo multiplex.

name: The Marina Mall
about: Modern mall with 120+ stores, Timezone arcade, trampoline park, inflatable park, and food court.
activities: Shopping, Dining, Cinema (INOX), Arcade, Trampoline Park

name: City Centre Mall
about: Popular shopping and entertainment hub with multiplex.
activities: Shopping, Dining, Cinema, Kids play area

name: Mayajaal Entertainment Complex
about: Entertainment complex featuring Asia’s largest 16-screen multiplex.
activities: Movies, Bowling, Indoor/Outdoor games, Arcade, Dining, Resort stay

name: Kapaleeshwarar Temple
about: Ancient Dravidian-style temple dedicated to Lord Shiva, dating back to the 7th century; famous for its towering gopuram and vibrant festivals.

name: Sri Parthasarathy Temple
about: Historic 8th-century temple dedicated to Lord Krishna (as Parthasarathy); built by Pallavas, known for intricate carvings and daily rituals.

name: Marundeeswarar Temple
about: Famous Shiva temple from Chola period; devotees believe prayers here cure ailments; notable for its large gopuram and inscriptions.

name: Arulmigu Karaneeswarar Temple
about: Prominent temple dedicated to Lord Shiva, known for its tall gopuram, traditional rituals, and peaceful ambience amidst the city.

name: Ashtalakshmi Temple
about: Modern temple by the seashore dedicated to Goddess Lakshmi in her 8 forms (Ashtalakshmi); known for unique multi-level structure.

name: Ananda Padmanabha Swamy Temple
about: Temple dedicated to Lord Vishnu, styled after Padmanabhaswamy temple of Kerala; serene location with traditional festivals.

name: Ramanatheeswarar Temple
about: Ancient Shiva temple believed to have been worshipped by Lord Rama; known for healing rituals and calm surroundings.

name: Madhya Kailash Temple
location: Adyar, Rajiv Gandhi Salai Junction, Chennai
about: Famous temple near IIT Madras, dedicated to Lord Venkateswara, also known for the unique idol “Adhyantha Prabhu” (half-Ganesha, half-Hanuman).

name: Santhome Cathedral Basilica
about: Roman Catholic minor basilica built over the tomb of St. Thomas the Apostle; one of only three basilicas worldwide built over an apostle’s tomb.

name: Church of Our Lady of Light (Luz Church)
about: One of the oldest churches in India, built in 1516 by Portuguese missionaries; known for its gothic architecture and serene ambience.

name: St. Mary’s Co-Cathedral
location: Armenian Street, Parry’s Corner, George Town, Chennai
about: Roman Catholic church built in 1658, among the earliest in Chennai; served as cathedral until 1886.

name: Walajah Big Mosque (Wallajah Mosque)
about: Built in 1795 by Nawab Wallajah; historic mosque known for its Indo-Islamic architecture and Friday gatherings.

name: Thousand Lights Shia Mosque
about: Magnificent mosque built in the early 19th century; important Shia place of worship, named after a thousand lamps lit to illuminate the hall.

name: Periamet Mosque
about: Prominent mosque in Periamet area serving the local Muslim community; known for large prayer gatherings.

name: Kadambalakam Puliyur Mosque
about: Historic mosque in Puliyur, Kodambakkam; peaceful environment and important community prayer centre.

name: St. Thomas Mount National Shrine
about: Historic Roman Catholic shrine atop a small hill, built at the site where St. Thomas the Apostle was martyred; offers panoramic views of the city.

name: Annai Velankanni Shrine
about: Popular seaside shrine dedicated to Our Lady of Good Health (Velankanni Matha); known for its white facade, peaceful ambience, and festivals.

name: Big Street Mosque
about: Historic mosque in the bustling Mannady area, also called Periya Pallivasal; important centre for daily prayers and Friday gatherings.

name: Besant Nagar Beach (Elliot’s Beach)
about: Popular beach in South Chennai, nicknamed Elliot’s Beach; known for its relaxing atmosphere, eateries nearby, and the Annai Velankanni Shrine.
activities: Walking, Sunset views, Food stalls, Relaxation

name: Thiruvalluvar Nagar Beach
about: Quiet neighborhood beach located near Thiruvanmiyur; less crowded compared to main city beaches, ideal for peaceful strolls.

name: Kottivakkam Beach
about: Serene beach stretch along ECR; favored by locals for morning walks, yoga, and sunrise views.

name: Elliot’s Beach (Chennai)
about: Also called Elliot’s Beach, quieter than Marina; popular with families, youth, and tourists; lined with cafes and eateries.

name: Marina Beach
about: World’s second-longest urban beach (13 km); iconic landmark with memorials, food stalls, horse rides, and cultural significance.
activities: Walking, Sunset views, Street food, Horse rides, Sightseeing

name: N4 Beach
about: Beach located near Ennore fishing harbor, popular among locals; not as commercialized as Marina or Elliot’s.

name: Kovalam Beach
about: Famous beach near ECR known as Covelong Beach; popular for water sports, surfing, fishing, and a weekend getaway.

name: Pattinapakkam Beach (Foreshore Estate Beach)
about: Beach near Foreshore Estate area; calm and less crowded, offering scenic views and peaceful evenings.

name: VGP Golden Beach
about: Private beach maintained by VGP Universal Kingdom amusement park; famous for its clean sand, activities, and family entertainment.
activities: Beach walks, Rides, Family outings, Entertainment

name: ECR Beach (East Coast Road stretch)
about: Series of scenic beaches along the East Coast Road, popular for long drives, seafood stalls, and casual hangouts.

name: Ooty (Udhagamandalam)
about: Known as the “Queen of Hill Stations,” Ooty is famous for its tea plantations, Nilgiri Mountain Railway (UNESCO), Botanical Garden, Ooty Lake, and scenic landscapes.
activities: Sightseeing, Boating, Trekking, Tea estate tours, Photography

name: Kodaikanal
about: Picturesque hill station nicknamed the “Princess of Hill Stations”; attractions include Kodaikanal Lake, Coaker’s Walk, Bryant Park, and waterfalls.

name: Yercaud
about: Serene hill station in the Shevaroy Hills; popular for Yercaud Lake, Anna Park, Servarayan Temple, and plantations of coffee and spices.

name: Yelagiri
about: Quiet and less commercialized hill station with Punganoor Lake, Jalagamparai Waterfalls, and trekking trails; popular for short weekend trips.

name: Top Slip
location: Anamalai Tiger Reserve, Coimbatore District, Tamil Nadu
about: Eco-tourism spot inside Anamalai Tiger Reserve; known for trekking, safaris, and wildlife spotting including elephants, gaur, and rare birds.

name: Valparai
about: Scenic hill town in the Anamalai Hills surrounded by tea plantations, waterfalls, and wildlife; eco-tourism hotspot.
activities: Trekking, Wildlife, Tea estate visits, Sightseeing

name: Kotagiri
about: Charming hill station, quieter than Ooty and Coonoor, famous for Catherine Falls, tea plantations, and trekking trails.

name: Coonoor
about: Second-largest hill station in the Nilgiris; attractions include Sim’s Park, Dolphin’s Nose viewpoint, and tea estates.
activities: Sightseeing, Trekking, Toy train rides, Tea tours

name: Manjolai Hills
about: Hidden gem hill station inside Kalakkad Mundanthurai Tiger Reserve; offers tea plantations, waterfalls, and trekking experiences.

name: Kolli Hills
about: Famous for its 70 hairpin bends drive, Agaya Gangai waterfalls, and herbal farms; retains its traditional rural charm.
activities: Trekking, Waterfalls, Road trips, Village tourism

name: Nilgiris (The Blue Mountains)
about: Mountain range home to Ooty, Coonoor, Kotagiri, and tea estates; UNESCO World Heritage Nilgiri Mountain Railway passes through.
activities: Hill tourism, Trekking, Tea plantation tours, Heritage train

name: VGP Water World
location: East Coast Road, Injambakkam, Chennai, Tamil Nadu
about: Popular water park section of VGP, featuring wave pools, slides, lazy river, and kids pools; part of the larger VGP entertainment complex.
activities: Water rides, Wave pool, Kids play area, Family entertainment

name: VGP Universal Kingdom
location: East Coast Road, Injambakkam, Chennai, Tamil Nadu
about: One of the largest amusement parks in Chennai with dry rides, water rides, petting zoo, aquarium, and private VGP Golden Beach access.
activities: Amusement rides, Water rides, Beach access, Family activities

name: MGM Dizzee World
location: East Coast Road, Muttukadu, Chennai, Tamil Nadu
about: Well-known amusement park with thrill rides, water rides, wave pools, cultural shows, and snow-themed entertainment.
activities: Amusement rides, Water park, Cultural shows, Snow world

name: Queensland Amusement Park
location: Chennai-Bengaluru Highway, Palanjur, Chennai, Tamil Nadu
about: Massive 70-acre amusement and water park featuring over 50 rides, wave pool, cable car, free fall tower, and kids play zones.
activities: Amusement rides, Water rides, Cable car, Family activities

name: SkyJumper Trampoline Park
location: VR Mall, Jawaharlal Nehru Road, Anna Nagar, Chennai, Tamil Nadu
about: Indoor trampoline-based adventure park with dodgeball, slam dunk, foam pit, wall climbing, and kids play area.
activities: Trampolines, Dodgeball, Foam pit, Indoor adventure

name: Snow Kingdom
location: VGP Universal Kingdom, East Coast Road, Chennai, Tamil Nadu
about: India’s largest snow theme park; offers snow slides, snowball fights, igloo zones, and -8°C snowy environment inside.
activities: Snow activities, Slides, Igloo experience, Family fun

name: Folk World Village (DakshinaChitra)
location: East Coast Road, Muttukadu, Chennai, Tamil Nadu
about: Living museum and cultural heritage center showcasing South Indian architecture, crafts, folk dances, and traditional lifestyles.
activities: Cultural exhibits, Folk shows, Handicrafts, Heritage walks

name: Niagara Falls Model
location: Queensland Amusement Park, Chennai, Tamil Nadu
about: Artificial replica of Niagara Falls inside Queensland Park; major photo attraction for visitors.

name: Chetpet Eco Park
about: Urban eco-park with a large lake, boating facilities, walking track, and children’s play area; peaceful green spot in the city.

name: Sivan Park
about: Neighborhood park in KK Nagar known for its greenery, walking tracks, children’s play zone, and community gatherings.

name: Semmozhi Poonga
location: Cathedral Road, Teynampet, Chennai, Tamil Nadu
about: 20-acre botanical garden with themed landscapes, exotic plants, artificial waterfall, and play area; a green lung in central Chennai.
activities: Nature walks, Photography, Kids play, Relaxation

name: Guindy National Park
about: Protected reserve in the heart of Chennai; home to blackbucks, deer, jackals, snakes, and birds; offers guided tours and children’s park.

name: Arignar Anna Zoological Park (Vandalur Zoo)
about: One of India’s largest zoos (602 hectares), housing 2500+ animals including tigers, lions, elephants, reptiles, and birds; safari rides available.
activities: Wildlife safari, Animal exhibits, Walking tours

name: Kalaignar Centenary Park
about: Newly developed riverside park with walking tracks, landscaped gardens, and modern seating spaces; popular evening relaxation spot.

name: Chennai Snake Park
location: Inside Guindy National Park Campus, Chennai, Tamil Nadu
about: Specialized reptile conservation center displaying 30+ snake species, lizards, turtles, and crocodiles; focuses on research and awareness.

name: Madras Crocodile Bank Trust
location: East Coast Road, Mamallapuram, Tamil Nadu
about: Conservation center founded in 1976; houses crocodiles, alligators, turtles, snakes; famous for night safari and reptile research programs.

name: Tiger Cave
about: Rock-cut Hindu monument maintained by ASI; features tiger-head carvings and a stage area; part of Pallava heritage near the coast.

name: VGP Marine Kingdom
location: East Coast Road, Injambakkam, Chennai, Tamil Nadu
about: India’s first large-scale public aquarium with underwater tunnel; houses 200+ marine species in five aquatic zones.
activities: Marine life viewing, Education, Family entertainment

name: Sea Shell Museum
about: India’s largest seashell museum with 40,000+ specimens, rare fossils, and marine-themed exhibits; includes a pearl museum and shopping section.

name: DakshinaChitra Heritage Museum
location: East Coast Road, Muttukadu, Chennai, Tamil Nadu
about: Living heritage museum showcasing South Indian culture, traditional houses, crafts, folk performances, and artisans at work.
activities: Heritage walk, Folk shows, Handicrafts, Cultural learning

name: Government Museum Chennai
location: Pantheon Road, Egmore, Chennai, Tamil Nadu
about: Established in 1851, India’s second-oldest museum; famous for Bronze Gallery, archaeology exhibits, Amaravathi sculptures, and children’s museum.
activities: Museum tours, History learning, Art viewing

name: Vivekananda House (Ice House)
location: Kamarajar Salai, Marina Beach, Chennai, Tamil Nadu
about: Historic building where Swami Vivekananda stayed in 1897; now a cultural museum with exhibits on his life, meditation room, and photo galleries.

name: Chokhi Dhani Chennai
about: Rajasthani-style ethnic village resort offering traditional food, folk dances, puppet shows, camel rides, and cultural programs.
activities: Rajasthani dinner, Folk shows, Camel rides, Cultural experience

name: Focus Art Gallery
about: Contemporary art gallery exhibiting Indian and international artists; organizes exhibitions, art sales, and cultural events.

name: Click Art Museum
location: VGP Snow Kingdom Complex, East Coast Road, Chennai, Tamil Nadu
about: India’s first 3D selfie museum featuring interactive art where visitors can pose creatively for fun optical illusion photos.

name: MGR Memorial
location: Marina Beach, Kamarajar Salai, Chennai, Tamil Nadu
about: Memorial dedicated to former Chief Minister M.G. Ramachandran, featuring landscaped gardens, eternal flame, and sea-facing structure.

name: Jayalalithaa Memorial
location: Marina Beach, Adjacent to MGR Memorial, Chennai, Tamil Nadu
about: Memorial honoring former CM J. Jayalalithaa, featuring Phoenix-shaped structure with granite pathways and landscaped surroundings.

name: Gallery Veda
location: Rutland Gate 5th Street, Nungambakkam, Chennai, Tamil Nadu
about: Contemporary art gallery showcasing Indian modern art, photography, and sculptures; hosts exhibitions, installations, and cultural programs.

name: National Art Gallery
location: Inside Government Museum Complex, Pantheon Road, Egmore, Chennai, Tamil Nadu
about: Historic Indo-Saracenic style building (1906) housing rare paintings, traditional Indian art, and colonial-era collections; part of Chennai Government Museum campus.

name: Lower Deck Bar & Nightclub
location: Hotel Radisson Blu, Egmore, Chennai, Tamil Nadu
about: Trendy nightclub inside Radisson Blu with a lively dance floor, cocktails, and weekend DJ nights.

name: 10 Downing Street
location: Wallace Garden, Nungambakkam, Chennai, Tamil Nadu
about: Popular British-style pub known for its retro music nights, karaoke, cocktails, and casual dining.

name: Flame Le Club
location: Hotel Le Royal Méridien, St. Thomas Mount, Chennai, Tamil Nadu
about: High-energy nightclub featuring dance floors, themed parties, luxury ambiance, and global music.

name: Radio Room
location: Savera Hotel, RK Salai, Mylapore, Chennai, Tamil Nadu
about: Retro-themed bar and lounge with live music, DJ performances, karaoke, and fusion cocktails.

name: Bay 146
location: Savera Hotel, RK Salai, Mylapore, Chennai, Tamil Nadu
about: Trendy restobar with an open stage for live bands, DJs, and a chic bar menu; popular for weekend nightlife.
activities: Live music, DJ nights, Drinks, Dance

name: Gandhi Mandapam
location: Sardar Patel Road, Adyar, Chennai, Tamil Nadu
about: Memorial dedicated to Mahatma Gandhi, surrounded by lush gardens; part of a series of memorials for Indian leaders.

name: Anna Centenary Library
about: Asia’s largest library with over 1.2 million books, modern digital facilities, children’s section, and quiet study areas.

name: Chennai Lighthouse
location: Marina Beach Road, Chennai, Tamil Nadu
about: Active lighthouse with a viewing gallery offering panoramic views of Marina Beach and the Bay of Bengal.

name: Birla Planetarium
about: Modern planetarium featuring sky shows, 360-degree projections on astronomy, science exhibitions, and interactive models.
timings: 10:00 AM – 5:45 PM (Closed on Republic Day, Independence Day, Gandhi Jayanthi)
